description.ko: 무너진 질서의 완벽한 균형, 흑백의 디지털 폭풍 속에서 혼돈과 구조가 충돌합니다.
description.en: The perfect balance of a collapsed order, where chaos and structure collide in a monochromatic digital storm.

prompt: 8k resolution, raytracing, sharp focus. A massive monochromatic monolithic sphere suspended in a white void, shattered into thousands of floating obsidian cubes and sharp geometric shards. Glitch art aesthetics featuring digital scanlines and pixel-sorted displacement tearing through the 3D space. High-contrast black and white lighting with brutalist shadows and complex monochrome textures.
